dcterms:description: The RST Discourse Treebank provides discourse markers and document-level discourse trees, which are used to evaluate discourse knowledge encoded in document-level models.
dcterms:title: RST Discourse Treebank (RST-DT)

dcterms:description: The Penn Discourse Treebank provides discourse markers for adjacent sentences and is used to evaluate discourse knowledge in sentence representations.
dcterms:title: Penn Discourse Treebank (PDTB)

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh

dcterms:description: ROCStories is a corpus designed for evaluating commonsense reasoning in story understanding, used in tasks related to sentence ordering.
dcterms:title: ROCStories

dcterms:creator: Dongyeop Kang

dcterms:description: PeerRead is a dataset of peer reviews that provides insights and applications for natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: PeerRead

dcterms:creator: Alexis Conneau
Douwe Kiela
dcterms:description: SentEval is an evaluation toolkit for universal sentence representations, used to benchmark sentence encoders.
dcterms:title: SentEval
